attributes.action: Abolish The House Of Lords if it opposes the EU Notification of withdrawal bill.
attributes.background: The House Of Commons has passed the article 50 bill to the lords, who are unelected.The decision to leave the European Union has been made and an unelected body should not be able to delay or thwart the will of 17.4 million people. The government must seek to abolish the lords if this happens.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178288
